required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 22, 2015
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug Use-results Survey in Patients Infected With Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1
clinical_study.official_title: Drug Use Results Survey in Patients Infected With Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of paritaprevir/ritonavir/ombitasvir used for patients infected with HCV genotype 1 in daily practice in Japan.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Sustained Virologic Response (SVR12)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study drug
primary_outcome.description: Hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid less than the lower limit of quantification 12 weeks after the last dose of study drug.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Sustained Virologic Response (SVR24)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 weeks after the last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid less than the lower limit of quantification 24 weeks after the last dose of study drug.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Virologic Failure After Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Confirmed quantifiable hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) at the end of 12 week treatment but subsequent viremia with HCV RNA greater than or equal to the lower limit of quantitation during follow-up period of 24 weeks after treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Virologic Failure During Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HCV RNA levels reach less than the lower limit of quantitation (LLOQ), then increase to greater than or equal to the LLOQ at any point during treatment.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Chronic infection of hepatitis C virus (HCV) Genotype 1 (GT1)
arm_group.description: Participants with confirmed chronic hepatitis C genotype 1, receiving paritaprevir/ritonavir/ombitasvir according to standard of care and in line with the current local label

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
HCV genotype 1 patients treated with paritaprevir/ritonavir/ombitasvir in daily practice
Exclusion Criteria:
Patients who have been previously treated with paritaprevir/ritonavir/ombitasvir
